short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get search results from web, images, videos and news.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Timezoner enables the user's browser to search web results. We are showing current time in 8 different timezones in a popup.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Timezoner Chrome extension and setting Chrome default search that is provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

The default search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

Terms & Conditions: https://timezoner.net/terms.php
